Yu Lab Handbook Qing Yu 2024-10-03 Chapter 1 Welcome! Welcome to the Yu Lab Handbook. Developed by Qing Yu, this handbook introduces the Yu Lab to prospective members, familiarizes current members with the lab environment, and outlines key guidelines for fostering an inclusive, collaborative space. Our goal is to make your research experience in the lab both productive and enjoyable. The Lab website The Lab Slack Channel Departmental website This handbook has been adapted from and influenced by several other works from the Schweppe, Morey, Peele, and Ritchey groups. The Yu Lab manual is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. Last Update: 10/2024
